title: Calories in a Brioche Roll
meta_description: Discover calories in brioche roll, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per roll with easy tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Standard medium brioche roll (~50 g), plain, baked without fillings or toppings; enriched with butter and eggs.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One brioche roll has about 170 kcal, with 25 g carbs and 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one brioche roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 170 kcal for a standard 50 g roll.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a brioche roll?
faqs.a: About 25 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 4 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is brioche roll high in fat?
faqs.a: It has 6 g fat per roll, mostly from butter, with 2.5 g saturated.

faqs.q: How does brioche compare to regular dinner roll?
faqs.a: Brioche is richer (170 kcal vs. ~100 kcal) due to added butter and eggs.

faqs.q: Can I reduce calories in brioche roll?
faqs.a: Opt for smaller size or whole grain; avoid butter toppings to cut ~30-50 kcal.
